space.network.message

Class TextMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.network.message.TextMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Message

    public class TextMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Message
    TextMessage represents text message that is able to be sent or received over the network.
    Author:
    James Greenwood-Thessman (300289004)

      • TextMessage

        public TextMessage(byte[] data)
        Creates the text message from data received over the network.
        Parameters:

        public byte[] toByteArray()
        Description copied from interface: Message
        Creates a byte array representation of the message. This integer array would be then be able to be sent over the network.
        Specified by:
